mapper.update: update db_alisku set SPUID = #{spuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLERID = #{sellerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MABANGSKU = #{mabangsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALISKU = #{alisku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMGURL = #{imgurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PRODUCTLINK = #{productlink,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SKUINFO = #{skuinfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SKUID, SPUID, SELLERID, MABANGSKU, ALISKU, IMGURL, 'NAME', PRODUCTLINK, SKUINFO from db_alisku
